### Request for Proposal
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of portable blood refrigerators to transport blood products across different locations, both domestically and internationally. The refrigerators must be delivered to the Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED) in Petawawa, Ontario.

The Contract Period will last from the date of contract award to March 31, 2029. 

Initial requirements must be received no later than six (6) weeks from contract award, or as soon as possible. Optional Requirements must be delivered before March 31, 2029.

This procurement is open to suppliers who have a contract with Canada and meet the requirements of the applicable trade agreement(s). Suppliers can submit their proposals in either French or English. 

Proposals must be submitted online, and supporting documents must be attached as required. Detailed instructions can be found in the attached documents.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
